ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Digest Number 581
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If you are determined to solo, the cougars in IC may be a better idea. Soulbinder on the dock if you need it, and watch out for Midnight, he s a black
ygData.messageBody:
>
> I may have to rethink my Velious career. Solo at 34 in EW seems a bit
> tough, even if I need the tufts.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
>
>

If you are determined to solo, the cougars in IC may be a better idea.
Soulbinder on the dock if you need it, and watch out for Midnight, he's
a black cougar, rather underconned. Or you can go to GD and get into a
giant group.
--------------
Bebinn Maolcataig 35 Woodelf Druid, Initiate of Tunare, Dignatio cum
Demori, Bertoxx server

Lindira 23 Vah Shir Bard,Jharin Apprentice, Bertoxx
